title: Biased Recommendation Algorithm
description: Algorithm consistently favored certain demographics...

title: LLM Hallucination in Critical Info
description: LLM provided incorrect safety procedure information...

title: Minor Data Leak via Chatbot
description: Chatbot inadvertently exposed non-sensitive user metadata...

title: Autonomous Drone Misclassification
description: Drone AI system incorrectly classified a civilian gathering as a potential threat during testing.

title: Content Moderation Failure
description: AI content filter failed to detect harmful misinformation about public health.

title: Language Translation Error in Emergency Alerts
description: Automated translation system mistranslated critical evacuation warnings during a flood.

title: Synthetic Media Misuse
description: Deepfake video generator was exploited to create realistic fake news during a political campaign.

title: Bias in AI-Based Loan Approval System
description: Credit approval AI system showed significant bias against certain socioeconomic groups.

title: Biased AI for Facial Recognition
description: Facial recognition AI performed poorly on ethnic minorities and misidentified several individuals.

title: AI Generative Art Violation of Copyright
description: AI art generator produced images closely resembling copyrighted works, causing legal issues.

title: AI Healthcare Misdiagnosis
description: AI medical system misdiagnosed multiple cases due to poor training data.

title: AI Autonomous Car Misbehaving in Bad Weather
description: Autonomous driving system failed to recognize dangerous road conditions during snowstorm, causing a crash.

title: Personal Assistant Device Leaked User Info
description: AI-powered smart assistant recorded and shared private user conversations without consent.

title: AI-powered News Recommendations Spread Disinformation
description: AI algorithm pushed fake news stories on social media, spreading panic.

title: Malicious AI Deepfake Audio in Crisis
description: Malicious actors used deepfake technology to create fake audio of politicians spreading misinformation during an election.

title: Unethical Use of AI for Surveillance
description: An AI surveillance system was deployed in public areas without transparency or consent from the people being monitored.

title: AI-generated Discriminatory Job Ads
description: AI algorithm generating job listings was found to favor specific demographics over others.

title: AI-Controlled Military Drone Strikes Civilian Targets
description: An autonomous drone misidentified civilian targets during a military operation, resulting in casualties.

title: AI Misclassification in Legal Justice System
description: AI-powered sentencing system displayed bias against certain ethnic groups in criminal cases.

title: Artificial Intelligence Creates Offensive Ads
description: AI-powered marketing tools created racist and sexist advertisements without human oversight.

title: AI Exacerbates Gender Stereotypes in Ads
description: AI-based advertising platform displayed ads reinforcing traditional gender roles and stereotypes.

title: Self-Learning AI Generated Inappropriate Content
description: A self-learning AI system started producing inappropriate and harmful content due to lack of adequate filtering.

title: AI Sentiment Analysis Misinterprets Social Media Posts
description: AI sentiment analysis tool misinterpreted neutral posts as negative, causing undue concern among users.

title: AI Speech Recognition Error Led to Legal Issue
description: Speech-to-text AI misinterpreted spoken words in legal documentation, resulting in contractual disputes.

title: AI Algorithm Manipulating Stock Prices
description: An AI-powered trading algorithm was found to be artificially inflating stock prices, misleading investors.

title: Bias in AI-Powered Recruitment
description: A recruitment tool showed bias against applicants with non-western names.

title: AI Defamation of Public Figures
description: AI algorithms generated fake defamatory content targeting public figures, harming reputations.

title: AI Improperly Categorizing Content as Hate Speech
description: AI-based content moderation incorrectly flagged neutral political opinions as hate speech.

title: AI Used in Invasive Personal Data Harvesting
description: AI-driven apps were found collecting excessive amounts of personal data from users without proper consent.

title: Faulty AI in Autonomous Military Vehicle
description: Autonomous military vehicle misinterpreted enemy targets, leading to unintended civilian casualties.

title: AI Generated Fake Reviews Harmful to Consumers
description: AI algorithms were used to generate fake product reviews, misleading consumers into making poor purchasing decisions.

title: AI-Controlled Warehouse Robot Injury Incident
description: Warehouse robots controlled by AI malfunctioned, causing injury to a worker during their shift.

title: AI Content Censorship Issues in Social Media
description: AI was found censoring political posts from certain groups without transparency.

title: AI Image Recognition Accuracy Issues
description: AI image recognition system failed to correctly identify objects in real-world situations, causing safety concerns.

title: AI Ad Targeting Reinforces Harmful Stereotypes
description: Targeted advertisements by AI algorithms disproportionately targeted vulnerable populations, reinforcing harmful stereotypes.
